    Fetches an active skill via GET through URL: /skills/active/{skillId}.

    java.lang.Iterable<Skill> SkillController.getSkills​(java.lang.Long candidateId)
    Fetches active skill entries for a particular candidate via GET through URL: /skills/candidate/{candidateId}.
